# fptcloud_tagging (Data Source)

Get information on tags for use in other resources. This data source provides all of the tag properties as configured on your account.

You can filter tags by key, value, or scope type.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "fptcloud_tagging" "example" {
  key   = "your_key_tag"
  value = "your_value_tag"
}

output "tag_id" {
  value = element(data.fptcloud_tagging.example.tags, 0).id
}

# Example: Get tag by key only
data "fptcloud_tagging" "by_key" {
  key = "tagging_vpc"
}

# Example: Get tag by value only
data "fptcloud_tagging" "by_value" {
  value = "tagging_vpc001"
}

# Example: Use tag ID in instance resource
data "fptcloud_tagging" "storage_tags" {
  key   = "tagging_vpc"
  value = "tagging_vpc001"
}

resource "fptcloud_instance" "instance" {
  # ... other configuration ...
  tag_ids = [element(data.fptcloud_tagging.storage_tags.tags, 0).id]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `key` (String) Filter tags by key
- `value` (String) Filter tags by value

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `tags` (List of Object) List of tags matching the filter criteria

<a id="nestedatt--tags"></a>
### Nested Schema for `tags`

Read-Only:

- `color` (String) The color of the tag
- `id` (String) The ID of the tag
- `key` (String) The key of the tag
- `resource_scopes` (List of String) List of resource scopes associated with the tag
- `scope_type` (String) The scope type of the tag (e.g., VPC, PROJECT, ORG)
- `value` (String) The value of the tag
